amendment.description: Manager's amendment makes technical and conforming changes to the bill and incorporates provisions dealing with veterans, rural and women entrepeneurs as well as green technology.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 111-121 to make conforming grammatical and technical corrections to the legislation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Velazquez.
